title: Fighting Warrior  for Spectrum 48K
creator_credit: Stephen Cargill, Melbourne House and Studio B
material_description: Cassette tape computer game. Cassette and cover in a plastic cassette case.
brief_description: Fighting Warrior [computer game]. Fighting Warrior is a single player side scrolling fighting game. Players have a high, mid and low attack, jump, duck and step back and must fight oncoming enemies in one on one combat.
creator_credit_for_label: Stephen Cargill, Melbourne House and Studio B
